source: Bachata Nights Victoria BC, Alysha Kopala and Sebastian Carmona
description: This Valentine’s Day event kicks off at 8:00 PM with a social dance starting at 20:00 and lasting until midnight. The evening includes an open-level bachata lesson at 8:15 PM, followed by social dancing and a special Red Light Hour with 100% Bachata music, plus a chance to vote for your favorite lead or follow.
